# Bob Filter Del
<!--
@name: Bob Filter Del
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Remove a specific or all filters applied to a bob.
## Parameters

- **index**: Index of the bob
- **filterName&dollar;**: Name of the filter to use (see list in the Bob Filter instruction)
---
